comment.author: 36509327@N04
comment._content: Claire thanks for pointing me to this as I love M&D. If I remember rightly Mill Street was famed as the first purpose-built bus station in the UK. The piano fronted TD Leylands were long gone when I was at Maidstone, but even though they were not in service I remember seeing them on Jersey with JMT.

comment.author: 39547465@N06
comment._content: The building still exists: relocated to the Kent & East Sussex Railway at Tenterden as the 'Station Refreshment Rooms'.
